user.title: Connect to Orei HDMI Matrix
user.description: Enter the connection details for your Orei HDMI Matrix.

data_description.host: IP address or hostname of the matrix
data_description.name: Friendly name for this device

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the matrix. Please check the IP address and port.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the device for status updates (in seconds)

send_command.name: Send Command
send_command.description: Send a raw command to the Orei HDMI Matrix.

device_id.name: Device
device_id.description: The Orei Matrix device to send the command to.

set_routing.name: Set Routing
set_routing.description: Route an input source to an output.

set_all_routing.name: Set All Routing
set_all_routing.description: Route all outputs to a single input source.

input.name: Input
input.description: The input source number (1-8) to route all outputs to.

save_preset.name: Save Preset
save_preset.description: Save the current routing configuration to a preset slot.

recall_preset.name: Recall Preset
recall_preset.description: Recall a previously saved routing preset.

preset.name: Preset
preset.description: The preset slot number (1-8) to recall.

preset.name: Preset
preset.description: The preset slot number (1-8) to clear.

cec_command.name: CEC Command
cec_command.description: Send a CEC command to an input or output device.

target_type.name: Target Type
target_type.description: Whether to send the command to an input or output.

target_number.name: Target Number
target_number.description: The input/output number (0 for all, 1-8 for specific).

copy_edid.name: Copy EDID
copy_edid.description: Copy EDID data from an output to an input.

input.name: Input
input.description: The input number to copy EDID to (0 for all, 1-8 for specific).

output.name: Output
output.description: The output number to copy EDID from (1-4).

set_logo.name: Set Logo
set_logo.description: Set the LCD display logo text.

text.name: Text
text.description: The logo text to display (max 16 characters).
